ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is not difficult for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is well within the power of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: That is not at all difficult for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and that it is not at all difficult for God to replace you with another creature if He so wills?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And this is not at all difficult for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And for Allah that is not hard or difficult.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And this is not difficult for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: that is surely no great matter for God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And that is no great matter for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: that is no difficult thing for God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And for Allah that is not hard.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and that is not a formidable thing for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor is that for Allah any great matter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And for Allah that is not hard or difficult (i.e. very easy for Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: indeed, that is no great thing for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And that is not difficult for God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that is not difficult for Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [14:20] And that for God is surely no great, [no] difficult, matter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And that is no great matter for Allah) that is not very difficult for Allah; He says: it is not very difficult for Allah to destroy you and create different beings.
